doc_string.value:
@notice Transfer ownership of GaugeController to `addr`
    @param addr Address to have ownership transferred to

natspec.author: Curve Finance

__init__(address,address).details: Prior to deployment you must deploy one copy of `VestingEscrowSimple` which is used as a library for vesting contracts deployed by this factory

params.addr: Address to have ownership transferred to

deploy_vesting_contract(address,address,.details: Each contract holds tokens which vest for a single account. Tokens must be sent to this contract via the regular `ERC20.transfer` method prior to calling this method.

params._amount: Amount of tokens being vested for `_recipient`
params._can_disable: Can admin disable recipient's ability to claim tokens?
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token being distributed
params._vesting_duration: Time period over which tokens are released
params._vesting_start: Epoch time when tokens begin to vest

deploy_vesting_contract(address,address,.details: Each contract holds tokens which vest for a single account. Tokens must be sent to this contract via the regular `ERC20.transfer` method prior to calling this method.

params._amount: Amount of tokens being vested for `_recipient`
params._can_disable: Can admin disable recipient's ability to claim tokens?
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token being distributed
params._vesting_duration: Time period over which tokens are released
params._vesting_start: Epoch time when tokens begin to vest

natspec.notice: Stores and distributes `ERC20CRV` tokens by deploying `VestingEscrowSimple` contracts
natspec.title: Vesting Escrow Factory
